tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_financing_instrument; CREATE or REPLACE VIEW v_financing_instrument AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.category_value, COALESCE(v.id, -999999999) AS id, v.terms_assist_id, v.financing_instrument_id, v.donor_org_id, v.mode_of_payment_id, v.funding_status_id, v.agreement_id, v.funding_id, v.vulnerable_group_id, v.project_results_available_id, v.donor_org_country_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.amp_activity_id, val.category_value, f.financing_instr_category_value AS id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, f.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, f.agreement as agreement_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id, f.vulnerable_group_va as vulnerable_group_id, CASE WHEN f.project_results_available THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS project_results_available_id, o.amp_country_id AS donor_org_country_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_category_value val ON f.financing_instr_category_value = val.id JOIN amp_organisation o ON f.amp_donor_org_id = o.amp_org_id ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
